title: 1 dead in daytime shooting in Newark, authorities say
body: One person died in a shooting on Saturday afternoon in Newark, an Essex County Prosecutor’s spokesman said.The shooting occurred on the 100 block of South 7th Street, said Essex County Chief Assistant Prosecutor Thomas Fennelly.The prosecutor’s office did not immediately release details about the victim’s identity.“It is very early in the investigation and no further information is available at this time,” Fennelly said.Note to readers: if you purchase something through one of our affiliate links we may earn a commission.
